MAIN_MESSAGE: The following information is for customers in the G83 postcode area of Alexandria. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:45PM due to repairs required on the underground cable network on the junction of Sandbank Crescent and Golfhill Drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and safely as possible by 1:45AM. We will update messages with any additional information as quickly as we can. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:10PM on 14 February 2021.
